title: Penalty
context: §347-18 Penalty. Any person who violates section 347-16 or 347-17 shall be fined not more than $100 or imprisoned not more than six months, or both. [L 1947, c 35, §3; RL 1955, §109-25; HRS §347-18] Cross References Classification of offense and authorized punishment, see §§701-107, 706-640, and 706-663.
